name: Alien invaders - Games prototype module
description:
Alien Invaders was my second project which I created during my studies at Teesside University, the focus of the entire project was mostly to practice and learn new skills whilst exploring the arcade/retro genre which was heavily inspired by games like space invaders and geometry wars.

  • The game features 2 basic enemy types.
  • Arcade style gameplay.
  • Points scoring.
  • Controller
